update.update_msg: update your app for grt all favorite now

posts.title: Get started with Pico Park!
posts.description: The game Pico Park is a local multiplay game that goes from 2 to 8 players. Each level in the game can be cleared when players get the key, unlock the door and all players reach it. PICO PARK has 48 levels and Battle Mode and Endless Mode...
posts.written:
The game Pico Park is a local multiplay game that goes from 2 to 8 players.
Each level in the game can be cleared when players get the key, unlock the door and all players reach it. PICO PARK has 48 levels and Battle Mode and Endless Mode

. The game is enjoyable and you can have fun with friends!

Pico Park is generally a local game that is not split-screen, you might be able to go to your friend's list and invite them to play together so technically everyone is playing locally.

A fun and enjoyable experience that will help you create strong bonds with people within a very casual, stress-free environment.

Pico Park creates memories with friends that will last a lifetime. There are times when friends can blame & argue with each other for not working together as a team :D but hey this game is fun when you have friends and that is what creates memories.

posts.title: How do I invite friends and family to play with me?
posts.description: Pico Park game is so enjoyable when you play it friends. Pico Park gives you the ability to play locally with multiplayer. Firstly, You must make sure that all players have logged into Facebook in-game and are Facebook friends with you. Then do the following steps:...
posts.written:
Pico Park game is so enjoyable when you play it friends. Pico Park gives you the ability to play locally with multiplayer.

Firstly, You must make sure that all players have logged into Facebook in-game and are Facebook friends with you. Then do the following steps:

1. Tap “Play Online”

2. You have the options a game mode (Full or Fast)

3. Choose a “World” and tap “Play”

4. Tap “Invite Friend” in the bottom-left of the Play Selection screen.

5. On the icon to the right Select the players you want to invite by tapping the “+”

At this point, your friends should receive the invitation. They have to accept it and they will be placed in the lobby with you. Once everyone is ready, tap the check-mark icon on the bottom-left corner to start the game!

posts.title: Can I play Pico Park on my phone?
posts.description: Pico Park is available on IOS and Android devices. it now supports online play. Each level of PICO PARK can be cleared when players get the key, unlock the door and all players reach it. But, every level requires cooperation to complete...
posts.written:
Pico Park is available on IOS and Android devices. it now supports online play.
Each level of PICO PARK can be cleared when players get the key, unlock the door and all players reach it. But, every level requires cooperation to complete.
If you're looking for a multiplayer game to play with your friends. This is it. This game is all about teamwork, thinking your way out of the box by solving puzzles, and trying to figure out a way out. Also, a lot of molding combined

posts.title: How to download Pico Park?
posts.description: Welcome!! PLEASE BEFORE U DO ANYTHING MAKE SURE TO RATE US 5 STARS BY SELECTING ONE OF THE EMOJI FACES DOWN BELOW TH PAGE BY SCROLLING DOWN IN ORDER TO UNLOCK THE DOWNLOAD LINK...
posts.written:
Welcome!! PLEASE BEFORE U DO ANYTHING MAKE SURE TO RATE US 5 STARS BY SELECTING ONE OF THE EMOJI FACES DOWN BELOW TH PAGE BY SCROLLING DOWN IN ORDER TO UNLOCK THE DOWNLOAD LINK.

Pico Park is now available on android (google play store) and IOS (app store).

Since you are on an android device just type it into your browserhttp://picoparkgame.com/en/
MAKE SURE TO TYPE THE URL WITHOUT MISTAKES.

Again, make sure to rate this app 5 stars before you visit the link so you can UNLOCK THE DOWNLOAD LINK.

posts.title: How do I invite friends and family to play with me?
posts.description: Pico Park game is so enjoyable when you play it friends. Pico Park gives you the ability to play locally with multiplayer. Firstly, You must make sure that all players have logged into Facebook in-game and are Facebook friends with you. Then do the following steps:...
posts.written:
Pico Park game is so enjoyable when you play it friends. Pico Park gives you the ability to play locally with multiplayer.

Firstly, You must make sure that all players have logged into Facebook in-game and are Facebook friends with you. Then do the following steps:

1. Tap “Play Online”

2. You have the options a game mode (Full or Fast)

3. Choose a “World” and tap “Play”

4. Tap “Invite Friend” in the bottom-left of the Play Selection screen.

5. On the icon to the right Select the players you want to invite by tapping the “+”

At this point, your friends should receive the invitation. They have to accept it and they will be placed in the lobby with you. Once everyone is ready, tap the check-mark icon on the bottom-left corner to start the game!
